alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:28PM MDT until July 05 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LAS ANIMAS COUNTY... At 327 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trinidad, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 320 PM, a spotter reported 1 inch hail 1 mile north of Trinidad. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Las Animas County. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
